svg:

Screen Elements:Vertical scrolling screen that moves upward continuouslyPlatforms scattered across the screen at different horizontal positionsScore counter in the top corner showing current height reachedPlayer character always stays in the vertical center or lower third of the screenBackground should be simple and non-distractingPlatforms can be different types (regular, breakable, moving)Player Movement:Character automatically jumps when landing on platformsPlayer controls left/right movement only:Using left/right arrow keys on keyboardUsing device tilt on mobile (accelerometer)Using touch screen by tapping left/right sidesCharacter wraps around screen edges (exits right side, appears on left)Falling below the bottom of the screen ends the gameCore Mechanics:Higher jumps from special platforms (springs, boost pads)Character maintains momentum during left/right movementSmooth acceleration/deceleration when changing directionCamera follows player upward movement but doesn't move downPlatforms are procedurally generated as player moves up
